latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

infractions.Violation Summary: School-based child care staff observed caring for children while unhealthy Staff medical certificate of fitness not provided
Children enrolled in school-based child care program have not received periodic medical examination
